block.p: STARK-Molly. On April 14, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Sidney. Devoted mother of Judy and Jack Hollenberg, and Ellen and Peter Berek. Dear sister of Beatrice Joseph and Hannah Hyman. Cherished grandmother of Steven, Rachel, Jonathan, Martha, Lisa, Laura and Elizabeth. Loving GiGi to seven great-granddaughters. Services Sunday, 1:30pm at ''Gutterman's, Inc.'' 175 Long Beach, Road, Rockville Centre, L.I.
